title: Elite athletes are using a new baking soda formulation to boost athletic...
content:
Elite athletes are using a new baking soda formulation to boost athletic performance. A recent study showed ‚Äúa 1.4% boost for cyclists in a 40-km time trial, which works out to a gain of roughly a minute over the course of an event lasting an hour‚Äù.
